text: Her swytelað on þisym gewryte hu Ælfsige abbod & se hired on niwan mynstre alendan Wlfmære an hide landes æt Bertune his dæg & his wifes on þæt gerad þæt syo hid & oðer hid æt Dregtune gangan into ðam mynistre swa gewered swa hy beon ofer hyra dæg.
& þisra twegra hida landgemæra sind, on ðæra bec ðe Drægtune uton be lið.

& his is gedon be Æðelredes cininges unnan & gewitnesse & Ælfrices arcebisceopes & Ælfheges bisceopes & Ælfrices ealdermannes & Æðelmæres & Ordulfes & Sulgeates & Æðelrices & Æðelweardes & þara þreora hireda on ealdan ministre & on nywan ministre & on nunan ministre.
& his is on þæt gerad gedon þæt Wlfmære sy freond & hold into ðem mynstre on ælcere stowe ægðer ge for Gode ge for worulde.
